items.q: How long does a typical code repair project take?
items.a: Most projects complete in 1–4 weeks depending on codebase size. We start with a free diagnostic audit to give you an accurate timeline before any commitment.

items.q: Do you work with any programming language or framework?
items.a: Yes. Our AI-assisted pipeline handles JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, PHP, Java, and more. We are framework-agnostic — React, Vue, Angular, Laravel, Spring — all supported.

items.q: Is my source code kept confidential?
items.a: Absolutely. We sign NDAs before accessing your code, process everything in isolated environments, and never store your source code after project completion.

items.q: What is the AI Sandbox and is it safe to use?
items.a: The AI Sandbox is a live demo environment where you can upload a .zip of your codebase and see our multi-agent analysis in action. No code is stored — everything runs in memory.

items.q: Do you offer ongoing maintenance after the repair?
items.a: Yes. We offer monthly retainer packages that cover continuous monitoring, dependency updates, and priority bug fixes.
